The house is amazing. Lots of room, large kitchen and fridge. I had the whole house to myself, but I never entered most of the rooms. Upstairs and downstairs are zoned separately for heat. One of the few places where I have gotten the tv to work; using my Netflix info. The beds in the main 2 rooms are very large. The one I slept in was very comfortable. Large bathroom with over a dozen towels. Since the house is so big I am guessing large groups use it and they would be very comfortable.
The house is just off the main road as you go into town so it's convenient to local restaurants. The classic country "Main Street" is just down the road. There was some traffic noise at night, but that is because the area is so quiet otherwise.
Parking is right next to the side door that is used. The door has a keypad that lights up, and goes right into an outer room, a "mud room"(?) that is well list, where there is a small bathroom, and a laundry area.
I had great communication with the Hosts. They have notes around the house explaining how things work, and restaurant suggestions.
If I return next year to do the race I was in, I will definitely stay there again.
